summary: A homebody hobbit in Middle Earth gets talked into joining a quest with a group of dwarves to recover their treasure from a dragon.
cast: Orson Bean|Richard Boone|Hans Conried|John Huston|Otto Preminger|Cyril Ritchard|Theodore Gottlieb|Paul Frees|Jack DeLeon|Don Messick|John Stephenson|Glenn Yarbrough|Thurl Ravenscroft
director: Directors: Jules Bass, Arthur Rankin Jr.
title: El hobbit
